Interface Attackable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ally, Character, Enemy, Player
public interface Attackable
Interface for defining the methods needed for any attackable object in the game.
Author:
George Paul

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void adjustDefence​(int adjustment)
    Method for adjusting the characters defence.
    void attack​(Character enemy, int attackPower)
    Method for attacking other characters
    void cry​(Character enemy)
    Useless method for increasing the enemies defence.
    int getAttackPower()
    Method for returning the characters atackPower
    int getHealth()
    Method for returning health of character.
    void setAttackPower​(int attackPower)
    Method for setting the attack power of the character.
    void setDefence​(int defence)
    Method for setting the defence of the character.
    void takeDamage​(int attackPower)
    Method for doing damage to the character
    void warCry​(Character enemy)
    Method for decreasing the enemies defence.

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      void takeDamage​(int attackPower)
      Method for doing damage to the character
      Parameters:
      attackPower - amount of damage to be dealt

    • adjustDefence

      void adjustDefence​(int adjustment)
      Method for adjusting the characters defence.
      Parameters:
      adjustment - How much to adjust the defence by

    • setDefence

      void setDefence​(int defence)
      Method for setting the defence of the character.
      Parameters:
      defence - desired new defence.

    • attack

      void attack​(Character enemy, int attackPower)
      Method for attacking other characters
      Parameters:
      enemy - Enemy to be attacked
      attackPower - Attack power to use (in case using weapon)

    • cry

      void cry​(Character enemy)
      Useless method for increasing the enemies defence.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Target enemy

    • warCry

      void warCry​(Character enemy)
      Method for decreasing the enemies defence.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Target enemy

    • getHealth

      int getHealth()
      Method for returning health of character.
      Returns:
      health of character

    • getAttackPower

      int getAttackPower()
      Method for returning the characters atackPower
      Returns:
      attackPower The attack power of the character

    • setAttackPower

      void setAttackPower​(int attackPower)
      Method for setting the attack power of the character.
      Parameters:
      attackPower - desired new attack power.
